Articles.Content: Vector, an American space start-up that builds its own launch vehicles, is testing their first orbital rocket in less than a week. Vector-R is a two-stage launch vehicle (which seems to be very popular these days) and is designed to have a relatively short time period between the launch order by the customer and liftoff. Read more about it at https://vectorspacesystems.com/vector-r/. Here's an approximation of their design that can make it well past LEO in the Kerbal universe!
